# Divider



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property      | Attribute     | Description                                                                                      | Type                                                                             | Default     |
| ------------- | ------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ----------- |
| `color`       | `color`       | Basic divider color variations depending on theme property.                                      | `"neutral-contrast-high" \| "neutral-contrast-low" \| "neutral-contrast-medium"` | `undefined` |
| `orientation` | `orientation` |                                                                                                  | `"vertical"`                                                                     | `undefined` |
| `theme`       | `theme`       | Adapts the text color depending on the theme. Has no effect when "inherit" is set as color prop. | `"dark" \| "light"`                                                              | `'light'`   |
